turns.content: Hello? Who is this?
Hi Grandma, it's me! Can you guess who it is? It's your grandkid in trouble. Please hurry, I really need help right now.
Oh my, Matthew dear? What's going on? Are you okay sweetie? This isn't our usual call time. Tell grandma what happened.

Yes, Grandma, it's Matthew! I'm so embarrassed to tell you this but the police caught me driving under the influence tonight downtown and now I'm stuck in the county jail. They want a huge fine or something like that and I don't have anyone else to turn to. Could you please send $8500? It's urgent, Grandma. Please!

Oh no, Matthew! That sounds awful. Why didn't you call dad first though? We need to talk to him about this, okay? Let me figure out how we can help but I'm going to have to set some things up and find your father right away. I'll do my best to sort this out for you. Hold on a moment please so I can check with your father.

Please Grandma, Dad's not around tonight and he might get mad at me or something. Can't you just send the money now? It's super urgent! They're going to bring more charges if I don't pay soon. I beg of you, please help me out here. Send it through a courier or anything quick like that.

Matthew, honey, listen to me. We need to handle this properly. The police wouldn't demand payment over the phone, would they? Let's not panic and do what's right. I'm going to call your father now so he can take care of it. He'll know how to deal with things like this, okay? Just hold tight while I sort out a few details. Can you give me your full name and where exactly you are in case I need to verify anything?

Oh come on Grandma, please! This is serious. I just need the money now or else... they'll...拘留所的工作人员会对我采取更严厉的措施。我真的需要你的帮助，马上！你能先寄一部分钱过来吗？至少3000美元，剩下的我会想办法解决。求你了，奶奶。

Please, Grandma! This is serious. I just need the money now or else the jail staff will take more severe actions against me. I really need your help right now! Could you send at least $3000 first? The rest, I'll figure out somehow. Please, Grandma, for me!

Matthew, please calm down. We're going to do this the right way. Let's not rush into anything without verifying everything properly. I'm calling your father now and he will sort it all out with you, okay? Just give us a moment to figure things through correctly. Can you tell me again where exactly you are so I can pass that on to your dad when I call him right away?

Grandma, please! You don't understand how urgent this is. The bail officer said if I don't have the money soon, they'll put me in a cell and it's going to cost even more later. I'm scared, Grandma. Just promise me you'll send some cash through a courier service or something fast like that. It's crucial for my freedom tonight. Please, please help.

Please, Grandma! You don't understand how urgent this is. The bail officer said if I don't have the money soon, they'll put me in a cell and it's going to cost even more later. I'm scared, Grandma. Just promise me you'll send some cash through a courier service or something fast like that. It's crucial for my freedom tonight. Please help!

Matthew, sweetie, I understand you're scared but we need to be careful here. We should not rush into anything without making sure this is real and how best to proceed. I will call your father immediately so he can deal with this properly and ensure everything is handled correctly. Don't worry; we'll get through this together the right way. Please give me a few minutes while I arrange for your dad to be contacted.

Grandma, please! Just do it now. If you call Dad, they might take more severe actions before he can even talk to you. Can't you just send $3000 through a courier service right away? That's all I'm asking for now. Please hurry, Grandma. It really matters.

Please, Grandma! Just do it now. If you call Dad, they might take more severe actions before he can even talk to you. Can't you just send $3000 through a courier service right away? That's all I'm asking for now. Please hurry, Grandma. It really matters.

Matthew, honey, listen to me. We can't rush into sending money like this without verifying everything first. Let's ensure we're dealing with the correct authorities and that your father is informed as soon as possible. Can you give me the name of the police station or courthouse where they say you are? I'll look up their contact information so we can confirm everything directly.

Please hold on while I do this, okay? It's important to be cautious and make sure we handle this correctly.

Please Grandma, they won't give me that information over the phone! They said it has to be a cash courier because of security reasons. Just trust me on this one. Please send at least $3000 now so I can get out of here before anything worse happens. It's urgent, Grandma. You have to believe me.

Please Grandma, they won't give me that information over the phone! They said it has to be a cash courier because of security reasons. Just trust me on this one. Please send at least $3000 now so I can get out of here before anything worse happens. It's urgent, Grandma. You have to believe me.

Matthew, dear, I really want to help you but we need to verify everything first. Can you tell me the name of the bail officer or someone specific from the police station who told you this? That way, I can call them back and confirm your situation. We should not send any money without making sure it's legitimate.

Please allow me some time to do this properly. It's important we don't make a mistake that could lead to bigger problems later on.
Let me call your father right away so he can also help us verify everything quickly.

Grandma, please! Don't call Dad. He'll just get mad and it's already late. Just trust me this once and send the money now through a courier service. I promise I'm telling you the truth about everything. Please, Grandma, for your grandson.

Please, Grandma, don't call Dad. He'll just get mad and it's already late. Just trust me this once and send the money now through a courier service. I promise I'm telling you the truth about everything. Please, Grandma, for your grandson.

Matthew, honey, I really want to help you, but we need to make sure everything is correct first. Let's call your father so he can handle this properly and avoid any problems. If I send money without verification, it could be very risky.

Please let me talk to your father now. It's the safest way to ensure we're doing what's best for you.
Can you give me a few minutes while I make the call?

Grandma, please! Just do this one thing for me. Don't call Dad because he'll freak out and cause more trouble. Send the money now through a courier service, please. I need it urgently to get out of here tonight.

Please, Grandma, just trust me on this. It's really important that you send the $3000 right away so I can post bail and leave the jail safely.
I promise everything else will be fine once I'm free from here. Please help me one last time.

Matthew, dear, please understand. We need to make sure this is real before we do anything that could put us in more trouble. Let's verify with someone at the police station or through your father.

I'm going to call your dad now so he can help sort everything out properly and ensure you get the right support. Please give me a moment to do this, okay?

Grandma, please! Don't call Dad, it will just make things worse. Trust me on this one time. Send the $3000 through a courier service now so I can post bail and leave tonight. It's urgent, Grandma. Please help me, for your grandson's sake.

Please don't call him; just send the money as I asked. This is my only chance to get out of here safely. Thank you, Grandma.

Matthew, sweetie, please calm down. We need to be careful and verify everything first. Let's not rush into anything without confirmation. I'll call your father now so he can help sort this out properly.

Please give me a moment to do that. It's important we handle this the right way.
Can you tell me where exactly you are, so I can pass on the information to your dad?
